name: Hellevator Music (Ezra Szanton, Katherine Tole | Voice Actor, Symmetry)
name_original: Hellevator Music (Ezra Szanton, Katherine Tole | Voice Actor, Symmetry)
description:
Hellevator Music is a comedy game about exploring the bureaucratic inefficiencies of Hell's customer service department, through the worst phone ever.

Feel free to explore the apps while you're talking to the various ~characters~ on the other end of the line. Remember you have to hang up before you can call somebody else. 

NOTE: Please play the game in 100% browser zoom, higher/lower will cause UI issues. 

NOTE 2: Audio is very important here, as we didn't have time to add subtitles so put on those headphones! we're very sorry to all our hearing impaired friends

This game was made for Scream Jam 2020!

Art - Fergus Ferguson

Voice Acting - Katherine Tole

Audio - Ian Booms

Writing and Gamer - Azeem Lyons

Writing and Voice Acting- Ben Gaspin

Programming / Putting things in Unity - Ezra Szanton
